评论详情: I got these jeans for my boyfriend. I really like the color and where they are faded, and the stitching.. well most of the stitching. They are clearly well made. He loves them. He's started wearing them all the time. But I hate them. The embroidery on the back pockets is too big and too low, so it completely hides his butt, and makes it look flat! He has a nice butt, so I really regret buying these for him. I would give it one star for that reason, but since he loves them, I have to be fair and split the difference.

评论概述: Sort of stiff, but that might change....
评论详情: After a good wash. So far, this pair of jeans seem to be of good quality. They are stretchy, which I like. I just don't like the legs, but that's a preference because I usually wear skinny/straight leg jeans. I like the embroidery work on the back on the packets - adds a nice touch of pizzaz to your jeans. All in all I would recommend this product.

You can't imagine that you can buy such a good quality men's jeans at such a cheap price. All the workmanship of these jeans is perfect, there is some stretch, they are comfortable to wear, wear a little later, and the colour will not come off after washing. They are especially good for everyday wear and look great with any top or shoes.
